pets.description: Information about the pet (name, type, breed, gender, standard questions etc).

owner.description: Details about the pet owner and address.

finalPriceConsent.description:
Client's consent for final price, should exactly match the finalPrice object from output.
Automation will not proceed with placing order until the consent is provided.

policyOptions.description: Cover start date, number of pets owned, second policy holder(if any).

selectedAddress.description: After postcode input a drop-down list with available addresses will appear. This input has the address selected from that list.

estimatedPrice.description:
Emitted before asking for payment information.
This is usually not the final amount to be paid, especially on websites which charge credit and company cards additionally. You will get finalPrice later.

finalPrice.description:
Emitted immediately before placing order, when final price is available.
Automation will request finalPriceConsent input which should match this object.

availableVetPaymentTerms.description: Available terms of vet bill coverage.

availablePaymentTerms.description: Available methods of payment (card, directdebit etc).

insuranceProductInformationDocument.description: Emitted when the document information is presented.

essentialInformation.description: Emitted when the esential information document is presented.

policyWording.description: Emitted when the policy wording is presented.

availablePaymentDays.description: List of available DD payment days.

eligibilityConditions.description: Emitted when the eligibility conditions are presented.

Pets.description: An array with flags and informations about pets.

breedType.description: The record of descent of an animal (i.e. Cross Breed, Pedigree).

enum: Pastore della Lessinia e del Lagorai

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

petPrice.description: The price given for the pet.

VetPaymentTerms.description: List of vet payment terms options.

VetPaymentTerm.description: Vet payment terms (i.e. Short-term & ongoing treatments, Short-term treatments).

PaymentTerm.description: Payment term. The outlier is monthly-directdebit-card, which specifies that card payment must be used to pay the initial deposit, but direct debit must be set up for recurring monthly payments.

Payment.description: Payment information, including card details and billing address.

selectedPaymentDay.description: Preferred payment day, one of availableCardPaymentDays.

accountNumber.description: The primary identifier for ownership of an bank account.

selectedPaymentDay.description: Preferred payment day, one of availablePaymentDays.

firstName.description: First name(s) or given name(s), as specified in ID.

middleName.description:
Middle name, if applicable.
This will only be used on websites which provide separate entry for middle names, otherwise it will be ignored.
If middle name is essential for placing order, consider appending it to firstName.

lastName.description: Last name or surname, as specified in ID.

dateOfBirth.description: Proposer's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

postcode.description: Postcode in country-specific format, e.g. 5-digit number in US or E3 3RP in UK.

purchaseReference.description: Reference code grabbed from the page.

message.example: Thank you for using UBIO Insurance. Your quote is ABC123 and purchase reference is DEF456.

price.description: Price, if found on the confirmation page.

errors.description: Given quote was not found by the insurer.
Registration number is not accepted by the website.
Registration number is required by the website.
The policy has already been purchased.
Direct debit details provided have been rejected by the website.
Breed type is required by the website.
